DOC.brief_summary: We aim determine effect vitamin D replacement therapy serum FGF-23 concentration vitamin D deficient woman compare FGF-23 concentration vitamin D deficient patient healthy subject patient genetically-determined hypophosphatemic rickets .
DOC.detailed_description: Study group compose vitamin D deficient female ( n =18 , mean age 29.1±9.9 yr ) , vitamin D sufficient healthy female ( control group ; n = 19 , mean age 28.5±5.2 yr ) patient genetically-determined hypophosphatemic rickets ( n=13 , mean age 26.5±15.1 yr ) . Groups compare serum FGF-23 , 1,25 dihydroxy vitamin D3 , calcium , phosphate , bone turnover marker , intact parathyroid hormone urinary excretion calcium phosphate . Vitamin D deficient group re-evaluated standard treatment regimen .
DOC.criteria: Serum 25OHD Vitamin < 30 ng/mL group 1 Serum 25OHD Vitamin > 30 ng/mL control group Receiving medication ( ) affect bone metabolism History gastrointestinal disease malabsorption History renal liver disease
